item.title: Indicators
item.description: A look inside the indicators databases > head(readRDS("accesibility_score_final_15.RDS")) ID_W value d 1 9112041001032 36 Barrio Amanecer 2 9101171003040 75 Barrio Amanecer 3 9101171003002 52 Barrio Amanecer 4 9101171001001 54 Barrio Amanecer 5 9101171003028 65 Barrio Amanecer 6 9101171002002 80 Barrio Amanecer COLUMN DESCRIPTION ID_W Census code related to manzana value Score of the indicator d Barrio’s name How to add a new indicator First you have to set up a database using the specifications above Then edit the hidden data.
